import React from 'react'; import { tagType, thirdweb } from '../../Resources/assets'; import { daysLeft } from '../../Resources/utils'; const FundCard = ({ owner, title, description, target, deadline, amountCollected, image, handleClick }) => { const remainingDays = daysLeft(deadline); return (

Education

{title}

{description}

{amountCollected}

Raised of {target}

{remainingDays}

Days Left

by {owner}

) } export default FundCard
